channel.title: Welcome on Ahmed Lahlou Mimi
channel.description: Recent content in Welcome on Ahmed Lahlou Mimi

item.title: Welcome
item.description:
Welcome everyone, My name is Ahmed Lahlou Mimi, I’m from Morocco. I’m currently a Student in Data Science (in France). I’m finishing a Gap year where I had the occasion to be a data scientist in 3 different companies.

I created this website to present some of my projects that I find worth sharing. I view this this website as an ooportunity to learn first and foremost.

Hope to see you soon.
